bibl.title: Columnar Translation: An Ancient Interpretive Tool that the Romans Gave the Greeks.
bibl.note: Columnar translation: the basic principles. - Ancient columnar translation under optimum conditions. - The columnar format compared to modern bilingual formats. - Columnar translation in the Vergil and Cicero papyri. - The history of columnar translation. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Eleanor Dickey, Columnar Translation: An Ancient Interpretive Tool that the Romans Gave the Greeks.

Columnar translation: the basic principles. - Ancient columnar translation under optimum conditions. - The columnar format compared to modern bilingual formats. - Columnar translation in the Vergil and Cicero papyri. - The history of columnar translation. - Avec résumé en anglais.
